issue.title: [Rust]: parquet-rowcount binary tries to open itself as a parquet file
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11305](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11305). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Introduced accidentally during clippy warning cleanups in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8687/files#diff-f3f978052bd519af87898fa196715ddb445c327045c09ed07be600ca4e1703b6R60
